abilities.desc: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target.
abilities.name: Fireblast
abilities.notes: When Multicast, Fireblast hits the same target each time with a 0.6 seconds interval.

abilities.desc: Drenches the target and another random unit in volatile chemicals, causing it to burst into flames. The target is in immense pain, taking damage and moving more slowly.
abilities.name: Ignite
abilities.notes: Ignite hitting an already affected unit adds to the burn duration.

abilities.desc: Incites a frenzy in a friendly unit, increasing its movement speed and attack speed. Gives bonus attacks speed if cast on Ogre himself. Can be cast on towers.
abilities.name: Bloodlust
abilities.notes: When multicast, nearby allies will be selected randomly in an 700.0 area of effect to receive Bloodlust.

abilities.desc: Blasts an enemy unit with a wave of fire, dealing damage and stunning the target. Its mana cost is 35% of Ogre Magi\'s current mana.
abilities.name: Unrefined Fireblast
abilities.notes: When Multicast, Unrefined Fireblast hits the same target each time with a 0.6 seconds interval.

abilities.desc: Creates a shield around the target ally, absorbing a percentage of the damage of next 3 attacks from enemy heroes. When damage is absorbed, a fireball is launched at the attacker. Can be cast on towers.
abilities.name: Fire Shield
abilities.notes: When multicast, nearby allies will be selected randomly in an 1000.0 area of effect to receive Fire Shield.

abilities.desc: Enables Ogre Magi to cast his abilities and items multiple times with each use.
abilities.name: Multicast
abilities.notes: Targeted abilities and items apply to additional enemies and neutrals in an AoE around Ogre. Fireblast and Unrefined Fireblast hit the same target multiple times.
